main.name: Tommy Tayler
main.description: I am passionate about using programming to solve problems, to use the skills I have and the skills I learn to help people
main.bio: My name is Tommy, I have recently graduated from Auckland University of Technology with a Bachelor of Software Engineering (Honours). Currently I'm learning React.js while looking for a graduate position
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details or to let me know of any job openings

resume.skillmessage: The skills below represent how much exposure I have had to each programing language

education.description: Studying at AUT was an amazing experience, I have gained an understanding of engineering fundamentals, problem solving, design, research, risk management and professional responsibility. I feel privileged to have studied there. My favorite thing about AUT is how they teach practically. For example, my first programming paper I was thrown into coding and I loved it! Further into my years at uni I picked up a minor in Computational Intelligence, this was a good addition and taught me an overview of Ai and Machine Learning.

work.title: Software Engineering Intern
work.description: Prototyping a crowd-sourced Helpline Finder website. Giving users, wherever they are in the world, access to the right helpline support for them as quickly as possible. Main objectives include speed, ease of use, and providing appropriate information are high priorities.
work.tech: Tech: React.js, Typescript, CSS, Vercel, Next.js, GitHub, Storybook, Adobe XD, InVision

work.title: Digital Strategies Intern
work.description: Create and implement digital tools to further the mission of Tandem Ministries by creating and editing content for Tandem digital assets, Web and graphic design for Tandem digital assets.
work.tech: Tech: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Adobe Experience Manager

work.title: Junior Software Developer
work.description: Develop, create, and modify an inventory management and recording software for a plant nursery. Web development of company website.
work.tech: Tech: Ruby on rails, Heroku, Git, GitHub, Rollbar, Postgres, Postico

projects.title: Production planning and recording tool
projects.category: Inventory management system built with Ruby on Rails

projects.title: Help line finding website
projects.category: Web app built with Typescript and Next.js

testimonials.text: Tommy was the sole developer in charge of this project. The client was impressed with Tommy’s development and system deployment. This project remains in production today which is a testament to Tommy’s produced work.

Tommy has been a pleasure to work with during this time. He is friendly, and a good listener, with a good work ethic exhibited both in our office environment. He communicates well, and I have been particularly impressed at his patience and careful explanation both during the training of our staff
